faculty.Research Interests: Theoretical Condensed Matter Physics. Novel effects arising from topology, interparticle interactions, or both. Exotic phases and unconventional responses to external fields in 2D moiré systems (e.g., twisted bilayer graphene), topological semimetals (e.g., Weyl semimetals), correlated systems (e.g., Kondo insulator SmB6), and superconducting heterostructures (e.g., ferromagnetic Josephson junctions).
